mapper.sql: ID , USER_ID, ORDER_SN, TOTAL_PRICE, TOTAL_QUANTITY, ORDER_STATUS, ADDRESS_INFO, PAY_INFO, SHIP_INFO, REFUND_TIME, CONFIRM_TIME, ORDER_CLOSE_TIME, ORDER_DETAILS, CDATE, CREATOR, EDATE, EDITOR
mapper.insert: insert into T_USER_ORDER(USER_ID, ORDER_SN, TOTAL_PRICE, TOTAL_QUANTITY, ORDER_STATUS, ADDRESS_INFO, PAY_INFO, SHIP_INFO, REFUND_TIME, CONFIRM_TIME, ORDER_CLOSE_TIME, ORDER_DETAILS, CDATE, CREATOR, EDATE, EDITOR) values (#{po.userId}, #{po.orderSn}, #{po.totalPrice}, #{po.totalQuantity}, #{po.orderStatus}, #{po.addressInfo}, #{po.payInfo}, #{po.shipInfo}, #{po.refundTime}, #{po.confirmTime}, #{po.orderCloseTime}, #{po.orderDetails}, #{po.cdate}, #{po.creator}, #{po.edate}, #{po.editor})
mapper.select: select COUNT(o.ID) AS allCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN o.ORDER_STATUS = 'UNPAY' THEN o.ID ELSE NULL END) AS unPay, COUNT(CASE WHEN o.ORDER_STATUS = 'PADYED' THEN o.ID ELSE NULL END) AS payed, COUNT(CASE WHEN o.ORDER_STATUS = 'CONSIGNMENT' THEN o.ID ELSE NULL END) AS consignment, COUNT(CASE WHEN o.ORDER_STATUS = 'CONFIRM' THEN o.ID ELSE NULL END) AS confirm, COUNT(CASE WHEN o.ORDER_STATUS = 'SUCCESS' THEN o.ID ELSE NULL END) AS success, COUNT(CASE WHEN o.ORDER_STATUS = 'CLOSE' THEN o.ID ELSE NULL END) AS `close` FROM T_USER_ORDER o where o.USER_ID = #{userId}
